column4: anybody else having trouble accessing the repositories via apt-get in the terminal
anybody know whats going on with the repos?
i tried to run update in the term but its telling me the it kind find the local hosts
i just wanted to know if I was the only one with this problem
well, i just ran update and its fine
are you here in the US?
what error are you getting when you run sudo apt-get update
dont know, doesn't make sense, works fine for me.
is it showing only 1 one repo is down or is it a specific one.
how long has it been like this?
not long less than an hour, i just installed wine not to long ago
well, if sudo apt-get update doesn't work,synaptic won't work, synaptic is just a GUI source manager
i had assumed that. You just never know
